title: Lag/packet loss problem
body:
Anyone having lag problem after 6.10 patch?
champion sliding
spell delay after cast
minions freezing
the gold "eg. +18" appear after 1-2 sec delay

sometimes this problem occur all game, sometimes no
sometimes is fine at the beginning ,and lag since mid game

replies.body: I'm having this issue as well... it's been going on for quite a while as well :S and the logs don't register the problem because my ping is perfectly stable BUT the game lags still and my FPS are as high as ever.

If it's inconsistent packet loss, I'd recommend submitting your network logs into our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  Should help to identify potential problems and give some fixes to the common causes.  Let me know if it helps!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=92B5aYQx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-19T20:52:40.399+0000)
>
> If it's inconsistent packet loss, I'd recommend submitting your network logs into our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  Should help to identify potential problems and give some fixes to the common causes.  Let me know if it helps!

no,i tried to restart the router, relesae and renew ip but the problem still
this problem just occur after the 6.10 patch and  takes 2 to 3 days.
at the past time, maybe some lag ,but didnt take so long to recover(like after restart router or computer).
This problem didn't star until patch 6.10 and it is still happening with 6.11
Starting to happen to me too in the game I'm in right now

Followup, ran the logs through Riot's log reader and logsoflag, I barely ever drop any packets and in this latest game I lost 12%.  My friend in the same game on the other side of the country also experienced EXTREME packet loss, way beyond what I was experiencing to the point that he was barely able to move.
Yeah I am having this exact problem as of 5/29/16 its hard to play with this going on.
I am having this problem as well.  I tried the log reader says around 10% packet loss, I tried forwarding the ports like it said and restarting router nothing helps.
alot of ppl like this m8, we just have to wait riot to solve the problems.
